document_data.name: The Four Stags
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite polyhedron/146/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: A Wayfarers Guide to the Forgotten Realms|43}}
document_data.mainbody: '''The Four Stags''' was a bustling 14{{th}} century [[DR]] inn on the northern end of the [[Bowshot (Border Kingdoms)|Bowshot]] road, where it met the [[Longcrag Ride]], in the untamed lands of [[Owlhold]] in the [[Border Kingdoms]].

Interior.Atmosphere: The inn was a busy place, always filled with the Owlen folks who sought to meet or trade with travelers, merchants, and other wayfarers.

document_data.Services: The Stags was a good quality inn that charged appropriately high [[coin]] for the lodgings as well as food and drink. This establishment was one of the very few places where locals traveled in order to buy, sell, or fraternize with outsiders.
